price: Àwọn tó ṣàì gbàgbọ́ wí pé: “Olúwa wa, fi àwọn méjèèjì tí wọ́n ṣì wá lọ́nà nínú àwọn àlùjànnú àti ènìyàn hàn wá, kí á fi àwọn méjèèjì sí abẹ́ ẹsẹ̀ wa, nítorí kí àwọn méjèèjì lè wà ní ìsàlẹ̀ pátápátá.”
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ رَبَّنَآ أَرِنَا ٱلَّذَيۡنِ أَضَلَّانَا مِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ نَجۡعَلۡهُمَا تَحۡتَ أَقۡدَامِنَا لِيَكُونَا مِنَ ٱلۡأَسۡفَلِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna kafarū rabbanā arinā alladhayni aḍallānā mina al-jini wal-insi najʿalhumā taḥta aqdāminā liyakūnā mina al-asfalīna
